verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הַבְּרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> And this [is] the blessing אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which בֵּרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> blessed מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> wherewith Moses אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> his death

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> And he said יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> The LORD מִסִּינַ֥י <WH5514> from Sinai בָּא֙ <WH935> came וְזָרַ֤ח <WH2224> and rose up מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> from Seir לָ֔מוֹ הוֹפִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3313> unto them he shined forth מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> from mount פָּארָ֔ן <WH6290> Paran וְאָתָ֖ה <WH857> and he came מֵרִבְבֹ֣ת <WH7233> with ten thousands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of saints מִֽימִינ֕וֹ <WH3225> from his right hand [אֵשְׁדָּת כ] (אֵ֥שׁ ק) (דָּ֖ת <WH799> fiery law ק) לָֽמוֹ׃

אַ֚ף <WH637> Yea חֹבֵ֣ב <WH2245> he loved עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> the people כָּל־ <WH3605> All קְדֹשָׁ֖יו <WH6918> all his saints בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> [are] in thy hand וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> and they תֻּכּ֣וּ <WH8497> and they sat down לְרַגְלֶ֔ךָ <WH7272> at thy feet יִשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> [every one] shall receive מִדַּבְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1703> of thy words
תּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> us a law צִוָּה־ <WH6680> commanded לָ֖נוּ מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> Moses מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <WH4181> [even] the inheritance קְהִלַּ֥ת <WH6952> of the congregation יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become בִישֻׁר֖וּן <WH3484> in Jeshurun מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> And he was king בְּהִתְאַסֵּף֙ <WH622> were gathered רָ֣אשֵׁי <WH7218> when the heads עָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people יַ֖חַד <WH3162> together שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> [and] the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
יְחִ֥י <WH2421> live רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> Let Reuben וְאַל־ <WH408> Nor יָמֹ֑ת <WH4191> and not die וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> become מְתָ֖יו <WH4962> and let [not] his men מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> be few ס

וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> regarding לִֽיהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> And this [is the blessing] of Judah וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> and he said שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> Hear יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> LORD ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאֶל־ <WH413> to עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> him unto his people תְּבִיאֶ֑נּוּ <WH935> and bring יָדָיו֙ <WH3027> let his hands רָ֣ב <WH7227> be sufficient ל֔וֹ וְעֵ֥זֶר <WH5828> for him and be thou an help מִצָּרָ֖יו <WH6862> [to him] from his enemies תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become ס

וּלְלֵוִ֣י <WH3878> And of Levi אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said תֻּמֶּ֥יךָ <WH8550> [Let] thy Thummim וְאוּרֶ֖יךָ <WH224> and thy Urim לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one חֲסִידֶ֑ךָ <WH2623> [be] with thy holy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Whom נִסִּיתוֹ֙ <WH5254> whom thou didst prove בְּמַסָּ֔ה <WH4532> at Massah תְּרִיבֵ֖הוּ <WH7378> [and with] whom thou didst strive עַל־ <WH5921> at מֵ֥י <WH4325> at the waters מְרִיבָֽה׃ <WH4809> of Meribah

הָאֹמֵ֞ר <WH559> Who said לְאָבִ֤יו <WH1> unto his father וּלְאִמּוֹ֙ <WH517> and to his mother לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor רְאִיתִ֔יו <WH7200> I have not seen וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> his brethren לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor הִכִּ֔יר <WH5234> him neither did he acknowledge וְאֶת־ <WH853> [בָּנֹו כ] (בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> afflicted ק) לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יָדָ֑ע <WH3045> nor knew כִּ֤י <WH3588> for שָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> for they have observed אִמְרָתֶ֔ךָ <WH565> thy word וּבְרִֽיתְךָ֖ <WH1285> thy covenant יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5341> and kept

יוֹר֤וּ <WH3384> They shall teach מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH4941> thy judgments לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob וְתוֹרָתְךָ֖ <WH8451> thy law לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> and Israel יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> they shall put קְטוֹרָה֙ <WH6988> incense בְּאַפֶּ֔ךָ <WH639> before וְכָלִ֖יל <WH3632> thee and whole burnt sacrifice עַֽל־ <WH5921> on מִזְבְּחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4196> upon thine altar

בָּרֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> Bless יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2428> his substance וּפֹ֥עַל <WH6467> the work יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> of his hands תִּרְצֶ֑ה <WH7521> and accept מְחַ֨ץ <WH4272> smite מָתְנַ֧יִם <WH4975> through the loins קָמָ֛יו <WH6965> of them that rise וּמְשַׂנְאָ֖יו <WH8130> against him and of them that hate מִן־ <WH4480> not יְקוּמֽוּן׃ <WH6965> again ס

לְבִנְיָמִ֣ן <WH1144> [And] of Benjamin אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said יְדִ֣יד <WH3039> The beloved יְהֹוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> in safety עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and חֹפֵ֤ף <WH2653> by him [and the LORD] shall cover עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> him all the day וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between כְּתֵיפָ֖יו <WH3802> between his shoulders שָׁכֵֽן׃ <WH7931> long and he shall dwell ס

וּלְיוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> And of Joseph אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said מְבֹרֶ֥כֶת <WH1288> Blessed יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> [be] his land מִמֶּ֤גֶד <WH4022> for the precious things שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of heaven מִטָּ֔ל <WH2919> for the dew וּמִתְּה֖וֹם <WH8415> and for the deep רֹבֶ֥צֶת <WH7257> that coucheth beneath תָּֽחַת׃ <WH8478> beneath

וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> And for the precious תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <WH8393> fruits שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> [brought forth] by the sun וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> and for the precious things גֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH1645> put forth יְרָחִֽים׃ <WH3391> by the moon

וּמֵרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> And for the chief things הַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> mountains קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> of the ancient וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> and for the precious things גִּבְע֥וֹת <WH1389> hills עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> of the lasting

וּמִמֶּ֗גֶד <WH4022> And for the precious things אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> and fulness וּרְצ֥וֹן <WH7522> thereof and [for] the good will שֹׁכְנִ֖י <WH7931> of him that dwelt סְנֶ֑ה <WH5572> in the bush תָּב֙וֹאתָה֙ <WH935> let [the blessing] come לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <WH6936> and upon the top of the head נְזִ֥יר <WH5139> of him [that was] separated אֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> from his brethren

בְּכ֨וֹר <WH1060> [is like] the firstling שׁוֹר֜וֹ <WH7794> of his bullock הָדָ֣ר <WH1926> His glory ל֗וֹ וְקַרְנֵ֤י <WH7161> and his horns רְאֵם֙ <WH7214> of unicorns קַרְנָ֔יו <WH7161> [are like] the horns בָּהֶ֗ם עַמִּ֛ים <WH5971> the people יְנַגַּ֥ח <WH5055> with them he shall push יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> to the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> and those רִבְב֣וֹת <WH7233> and they [are] the ten thousands אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> and those אַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> and they [are] the thousands מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> of Manasseh ס

וְלִזְבוּלֻ֣ן <WH2074> And of Zebulun אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said שְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> Rejoice זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> Zebulun בְּצֵאתֶ֑ךָ <WH3318> in thy going out וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> and Issachar בְּאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH168> in thy tents

עַמִּים֙ <WH5971> the people הַר־ <WH2022> unto the mountain יִקְרָ֔אוּ <WH7121> They shall call שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> There יִזְבְּח֣וּ <WH2076> there they shall offer זִבְחֵי־ <WH2077> sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness כִּ֣י <WH3588> out שֶׁ֤פַע <WH8228> [of] the abundance יַמִּים֙ <WH3220> of the seas יִינָ֔קוּ <WH3243> for they shall suck וּשְׂפוּנֵ֖י <WH8226> and [of] treasures טְמ֥וּנֵי <WH2934> hid חֽוֹל׃ <WH2344> in the sand ס

וּלְגָ֣ד <WH1410> And of Gad אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed מַרְחִ֣יב <WH7337> [be] he that enlargeth גָּ֑ד <WH1410> Gad כְּלָבִ֣יא <WH3833> as a lion שָׁכֵ֔ן <WH7931> he dwelleth וְטָרַ֥ף <WH2963> and teareth זְר֖וֹעַ <WH2220> the arm אַף־ <WH637> with קָדְקֹֽד׃ <WH6936> the crown of the head

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> And he provided רֵאשִׁית֙ <WH7225> the first part ל֔וֹ כִּי־ <WH3588> For שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there חֶלְקַ֥ת <WH2513> for himself because there [in] a portion מְחֹקֵ֖ק <WH2710> of the lawgiver סָפ֑וּן <WH5603> [was he] seated וַיֵּתֵא֙ <WH857> and he came רָ֣אשֵׁי <WH7218> with the heads עָ֔ם <WH5971> of the people צִדְקַ֤ת <WH6666> the justice יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> he executed וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <WH4941> and his judgments עִם־ <WH5973> with יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> with Israel ס

וּלְדָ֣ן <WH1835> And of Dan אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said דָּ֖ן <WH1835> Dan גּ֣וּר <WH1482> whelp אַרְיֵ֑ה <WH738> [is] a lion's יְזַנֵּ֖ק <WH2187> he shall leap מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> from Bashan

וּלְנַפְתָּלִ֣י <WH5321> And of Naphtali אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said נַפְתָּלִי֙ <WH5321> O Naphtali שְׂבַ֣ע <WH7649> satisfied רָצ֔וֹן <WH7522> with favour וּמָלֵ֖א <WH4392> and full בִּרְכַּ֣ת <WH1293> with the blessing יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD יָ֥ם <WH3220> thou the west וְדָר֖וֹם <WH1864> and the south יְרָֽשָׁה׃ <WH3423> possess ס

וּלְאָשֵׁ֣ר <WH836> And of Asher אָמַ֔ר <WH559> he said בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> [be] blessed מִבָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> with children אָשֵׁ֑ר <WH836> [Let] Asher יְהִ֤י <WH1961> become רְצוּי֙ <WH7521> let him be acceptable אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> to his brethren וְטֹבֵ֥ל <WH2881> and let him dip בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> in oil רַגְלֽוֹ׃ <WH7272> his foot
בַּרְזֶ֥ל <WH1270> [shall be] iron וּנְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> and brass מִנְעָלֶ֑יךָ <WH4515> Thy shoes וּכְיָמֶ֖יךָ <WH3117> and as thy days דָּבְאֶֽךָ׃ <WH1679> [so shall] thy strength

אֵ֥ין <WH369> There כָּאֵ֖ל <WH410> [There is] none like unto the God יְשֻׁר֑וּן <WH3484> of Jeshurun רֹכֵ֤ב <WH7392> [who] rideth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> upon the heaven בְעֶזְרֶ֔ךָ <WH5828> in thy help וּבְגַאֲוָת֖וֹ <WH1346> and in his excellency שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> on the sky

מְעֹנָה֙ <WH4585> [is thy] refuge אֱלֹ֣הֵי <WH430> God קֶ֔דֶם <WH6924> The eternal וּמִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> and underneath זְרֹעֹ֣ת <WH2220> arms עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> and underneath [are] the everlasting וַיְגָ֧רֶשׁ <WH1644> and he shall thrust out מִפָּנֶ֛יךָ <WH6440> from before אוֹיֵ֖ב <WH341> the enemy וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> thee and shall say הַשְׁמֵֽד׃ <WH8045> Destroy

וַיִּשְׁכֹּן֩ <WH7931> then shall dwell יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> Israel בֶּ֤טַח <WH983> in safety בָּדָד֙ <WH910> alone עֵ֣ין <WH5869> the fountain יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> in אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> [shall be] upon a land דָּגָ֣ן <WH1715> of corn וְתִיר֑וֹשׁ <WH8492> and wine אַף־ <WH637> also שָׁמָ֖יו <WH8064> also his heavens יַ֥עַרְפוּ <WH6201> shall drop down טָֽל׃ <WH2919> dew

אַשְׁרֶ֨יךָ <WH835> Happy יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> [art] thou O Israel מִ֣י <WH4310> Who כָמ֗וֹךָ <WH3644> is like עַ֚ם <WH5971> who [is] like unto thee O people נוֹשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> saved בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> by the LORD מָגֵ֣ן <WH4043> the shield עֶזְרֶ֔ךָ <WH5828> of thy help וַאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> and who [is] the sword גַּאֲוָתֶ֑ךָ <WH1346> of thy excellency וְיִכָּֽחֲשׁ֤וּ <WH3584> shall be found liars אֹיְבֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH341> and thine enemies לָ֔ךְ וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עַל־ <WH5921> upon בָּמוֹתֵ֥ימוֹ <WH1116> upon their high places תִדְרֹֽךְ׃ <WH1869> unto thee and thou shalt tread ס
